mapper.select: SELECT o.orsh_no as orsh_no, prod_cd, o.ca_no, ordr_dtl_cnt, TO_CHAR(dlvry_dt,'rrrr-MM-dd') as dlvry_dt, TO_CHAR(orsh_dt,'rrrr-MM-dd') as orsh_dt, orsh_pr, d.cpr_cd as cpr_cd, cpr_nm, ca_nm FROM order_sheet o , order_sheet_detail d , cm_product_mng p , cm_account a WHERE o.orsh_no = d.orsh_no AND d.cpr_cd = p.cpr_cd(+) and o.ca_no = a.ca_no(+) ORDER BY 1
